benefits.name: Banners at front of room
benefits.description: The Sponsor is entitled to have a banner featuring their company name and logo at the front of the rooms used for presentation of conference talks.

benefits.name: Business description on website
benefits.description: The Sponsor is entitled to have a short (1 paragraph, 300 characters) description of their company and products or services listed on The Event website.

benefits.name: Logo featured on the recorded session videos
benefits.description: The Sponsor is entitled to have their logo appear on the recorded video session

benefits.name: ‍Option to choose one individual sponsor benefit
benefits.description:
The Sponsor is entitled to claim one (1) of the following sponsor benefits.  Each of the benefits can be claimed by only one sponsor on a first come first serve basis after the sponsorship contract has been executed and the sponsorship confirmed. 

* The Sponsor's name will appear on the conference lanyards

* The Sponsor will be credited as the sponsor for the evening social event

* The Sponsor will be credited as the sponsor for meals and coffee breaks

* The Sponsor will be credited as the sponsor for the Unconference

* The Sponsor will be credited as the sponsor of the social area and any lounges

* The Sponsor will be entitled to leave an item provided by The Sponsor on chairs during a plenary session (“Chair Drop”)

benefits.name: Acknowledged in Opening & Closing Session
benefits.description: The Sponsor will be mentioned (by company name) and thanked in the opening and closing sessions.

benefits.name: Logo on t-shirt
benefits.description: The Sponsor is entitled to have their logo printed on the conference t-shirt. Sponsors logos will be arranged by The Organizer to give Gold level sponsors a more prominent placement than Silver level Sponsors.

benefits.name: Promotional item distribution
benefits.description: The Sponsor has the right to distribute 1 large and 1 small promotional item to The  Event attendees.

benefits.name: Logo on website
benefits.description: The Sponsor is entitled to have their name and logo listed in the sponsors section of the pgconf.dev website.

benefits.name: Free conference vouchers
benefits.description: The Sponsor is entitled to five (5) free voucher to the conference

benefits.name: ‍Logo featured in conference banner in foyer and common areas
benefits.description: The Sponsor is entitled to have their logo appear (alongside those of other sponsors) on The Event banners in the common areas of the conferences.

benefits.name: Job listing on website
benefits.description: The Sponsor is entitled to have 3 job posting appear on The Event website.

benefits.name: Sticker benefit
benefits.description: The sponsor is entitled to bring stickers that can be left at designated sticker tables
